paper_abstract: The pth moment exponential stability of stochastic Cohen-Grossberg with time-varying delays is investigated in this paper. A set of novel sufficient conditions on pth moment exponential stability are given for the considered system by using the well-known Razumikhin-type theorem. Finally, two examples with their numerical simulations are provided to show the correctness of our analysis.
paper_title: pth moment exponential stability of stochastic cohen-grossberg neural networks with time-varying delays
